Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Johnson emphasized the significance of the wicket and their strategy to capitalize on it.
Canada is motivated by their maiden T20 World Cup win against Ireland to compete with stronger teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is Canada's first T20 World Cup match against a test-playing nation.
Pakistan's poor form in the tournament could be an opportunity for Canada.
Others: Canada's potential historical significance of the win and investment in cricket.
Previous encounter between Canada and Pakistan in 2008.
